name: ReleasePackager
description: Create release package with dependencies management as in Nuget
author: Riwut Libinuko (cakriwut@gmail.com)

inputs.name: mainNuspec
inputs.label: Path/Pattern to main nuspec
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path main release nuspec file. The main nuspec file name will determine the partial nuspec. For example, if project.nuspec is the main nuspec, then other.project.nuspec, next.project.nuspec are example of partial nuspec. Those partial nuspec will be merge during the compilation.

inputs.name: versionByBuild
inputs.label: Use Build number to version the package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will use the build number to version Release package. Under General set the build format to be '$(BuildDefinitionName)_$(Year:yyyy).$(Month).$(DayOfMonth)$(Rev:.r)
